column5: HorseShoe Lake near Cloyne or arden ??  I got an invite from a friend to go fishing at his cottage on this lake hes not much of a fisherman , i'm having a heck of a time finding any information on it like what kinds of fish are in there , and if its a rocky or weedy lake i'm mainly interested in pickeral fishing its in 2 weeks so no bass fishing  Thanks in advance for any info!! we will be boat fishing so maybe a place to try in a joining lake Thanks alot this is new area for me and i'm only there for one full day
Here's a guide to some lakes  http://www.thefishinguide.com/onsefp.shtml
the lake is east of Lake sKootamata..... anyone......
Never fished it but I believe it is a trio of lakes that have good smallmouth bass and pike fishing.  It will likely be like the rest of the lakes around there rocky and deep.
I dont think its near Skootamatta.Its just south of # 7 hwy. at Arden a friend of mine fishes it he says he does good on the walleye there.
yea thats the one i think !!!! thanks
